name: Hunt The Monster - Prototype
description:
Hunt the Monster

A prototype game.

Background

A simple prototype game inspired by "Hunt the Wumpus".  

I was building this prototype out to play with the idea a bit for a larger game idea around it.  Not sure if I'll build it further at this point, but I wanted to publish this prototype nonetheless.

Rules

You move from room to room trying to determine where the monster is and avoid the traps.

If you think you know where the monster is you can mark the door.  If you mark the wrong door, you lose.  If you mark the right door, you win.

Controls

WASD - Move
E - Open doors
F - Mark doors

View Source Code on Github
